item.description:
http://youtu.be/fetaINd7FEE

April 27 SAT 2013

9:30 am - 4:30 pm at  Rabb Hall, Boston Public Library

700 Boylston St. Boston, MA, Copley Sq Boston.

Participating Schools:
John D. O'Bryant
Boston Latin Academy
Lynn Classical High School
Everett High School
Lawrence Humanities and Leadership High School
Newburyport High School
South Community High School - Worcester
Revere High School
Chelsea High School
Watertown High School

This event is free and open to the public.

Final StoriesLive® Scholarship Slam: April 27th:

8:50 am Event organizers and volunteers are admitted to the venue
9:00 am Event attendees register by 9:30 am for a spot in the slam sophomore or senior slams

Morning Session: 9:30-11:30am

Then break for light lunch and pizza, wraps and salad for students in Conference room.

Afternoon Session:

1:00 pm-3:30pm  Junior slam

4:00pm Awards ceremony

When: Saturday, April 27, 2013
Where: Rabb Hall- Central Library, Boston Public Library
700 Boylston Street, Boston MA 02116
Copley Square

Transportation: Green Line, Orange Line and several busesFREE and open to the publichttp://youtu.be/fetaINd7FEE

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: StoriesLive® High School Scholarship Story Slam
